attributes.action: stop paying any bank managers "consultant fees!!!" who are responsible for the mess of our economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: having just watched the news tonight where the managers of britains banks were "forced to apologise" to the public only to hear them to admit they were still receiving bonuses and consultant fees (£60,000) a bloody MONTH!, I have created this petition to stop this typical British   madness. SACK THEM NOW!!! This has angered me so much that i had to do something. So join me and get these idiots out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
